mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM cart WHERE cus_no = #{cus_no}

SELECT c.*, p.name AS p_name, p.prod_image, s.name AS brand, p.price AS price, p.saled_price AS saled_price FROM cart c INNER JOIN product p INNER JOIN seller s ON c.prod_no = p.id AND p.seller_no = s.id WHERE c.cus_no = #{cus_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (cus_no, prod_no, count, size, add_date) VALUES (#{cus_no}, #{prod_no}, #{count}, #{size}, NOW())
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart WHERE cus_no = #{cus_no} AND id = #{id}
